HideOffline.label: Hide offline channels
HideOffline.tooltip: Hide offline channels in the web UI

MinViewers.label: Minimum Viewers
MinViewers.tooltip: The minimum viweres a raid or host must have to be tracked

NewTarget.label: New Target Names
NewTarget.tooltip: Username of new raid target (supports multiple targets seperated by space)

RemoveTarget.label: Remove Target Names
RemoveTarget.tooltip: Username of raid target to be removed (supports multiple targets seperated by space)

hostGoal.label: Host Goal
hostGoal.tooltip: Goal for people hosting the channel.

zbtnCopy.label: Copy Overlay Path
zbtnCopy.tooltip: Copies the path to the hosts overlay to the clipboard.

zbtnCopy2.label: Copy Hosts File Path
zbtnCopy2.tooltip: Copies the path to the active hosts file to the clipboard.
